tool.purpose: Anica is an [A]utomated [N]on-[I]nterference [C]heck [A]ssistant, checking positive place based non-interference (PBNI+) and place based non-interference with downgrading (PBNID) for safe Petri nets.
tool.authors: * Andreas Lehmann implemented the core functionality of Anica
tool.thanks: * Thanks to Niels Lohmann and Dirk Fahland for developing the idea to transform the problem to reachabilty.
